title: N8N Workflow Auto-Reconciliation Danger
description: CRITICAL LESSON: N8N auto-reconciliation nodes are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS. They can CREATE records when they should UPDATE, corrupting production data. Specific issues: 1) Used invalid merge mode 'waitForAll' instead of 'append' 2) Added untested filters that return zero results 3) Auto-recon created duplicates instead of updating 4) Used fallback values (quantity=1) without validation 5) No testing before production deployment. RULE: NEVER use auto-reconciliation in production without extensive testing and safeguards.
